name: Mordicus - A Banana pushing puzzle game
name_original: Mordicus - A Banana pushing puzzle game
description:
What is Mordicus ?

Mordicus is a Sokoban inspired puzzle game from the Vidéoway!

(A Lost Media Video Game Console from the province of Québec in Canada)

The goal of each level is to feed the monkeys with bananas until there's none left.  (Watch out to not get eaten too!)

This version of mordicus is an HTML 5 port of a Flash Remake I did back in 2010. It did receive over 25 thousand plays on deviantart alone.

Features :

  • - 43 levels, including an impossible level in there
  • - Mobile supported
  • - 8 different interactable items
  • - Mobile controls
  • -Push multiple blocks at once

Differences from the original remake :

  • - Update graphics, with now 200% more gradients
  • - Level select with every level unlocked form the start instead of a dumb password system
  • - Bug fixes
  • - Added a note to skip an impossible level
  • - Mobile controls
  • - Infinite lives

Controls

  • Move with the arrows
  • On mobile : Click the blue arrows blocks at the bottom
